🌷【STYLE YOU CAN COUNT ON】Fitonus smart watch for women adopts a borderless design and an rose gold aerometal aluminum alloy bezel, also we have prepared a rose gold stainless steel band and a skin-friendly silicone band to enhance your most fashionable outfits. And a 1.32” tempered HD LCD with IPS technology for enhanced color and clarity. The “Always-On Display” feature allows you to keep the screen on at any time with low power consumption

📞【Stay Connected On The Go】The Bluetooth smart watches for women feature a built-in microphone and HD speaker, allowing you to answer and make calls via Bluetooth connection. The smartwatch can sync contact information and store call records. You can also receive real-time notifications from social platforms like SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram, ensuring you never miss any important calls or messages. Plus, it's compatible with voice assistants for simplified operation

💟【Health Is in Your Hands】Experience 24/7 health protection with cycle prediction, heart rate monitoring, blood oxygen measurement, blood pressure tracking, and sleep analysis. The fitness tracker will vibrate promptly to alert you when there are unusual changes in your body data. In addition, this smart watch offers 4 functions for women: menstrual cycle, safe period, ovulation and pregnancy monitoring to help women better understand their physiological period, also provide considerate care

🏃‍♀️【Tailored Health for Women】With 120+ sports modes, including Yoga, running, and fitness, you can set your daily exercise goals in the fitness watch or the app, allowing you to plan ahead. The smart watch for iphone compatible comes with built-in sensors to track your steps, distance, calories, and heart rate, serving as your perfect fitness companion. This fitness tracker watch for women waterproof up to 15 meters (IP68 level)

🔋【Long Battery Life and Versatile Features】The blood pressure watch offers 3-5 days of battery life on a single 2-hour charge. Customize your Bluetooth watch with over 200 dials in the app. The fitness watch for women also boasts features like an always-on screen, remote camera control, music playback, calendar, alarm clock, calculator, weather forecast, brightness adjustments, pedometer, stopwatch, and other functions to accompany you through every wonderful moment

🎁【Unlimited Experience】The smart watch for android phones is designed to meet the unique health needs of women, whether for Christmas, Easter or other festivals or birthdays, it is the most suitable gift for women. Perfect Gift Choice! Bought this smartwatch as a Christmas, birthday gift for your friend or lovers, it's a hit! Stylish design, seamless connectivity, and accurate health tracking features make it an ideal choice. Learn More

Basic Functions and Specifications of Fitonus Smart Watch 2 Watch Strap The smart watch comes with 2 free straps, a black gold stainless steel strap, a pink silicone strap. Always On Display (AOD) The smart watches for women adopts a 1.32" ultra-high-definition screen design. It supports digital clock and analog clock to be displayed all the time. 200+ Watch Dial There are 200+ different watch face designs for smart watches. In addition, if you have a favorite picture, you could also customize it as a watch face through the APP. Answer/Make Calls The Smartwatches not only can you answer calls, but also have a digital dialing function. Make and receive calls simultaneously on your wrist. Monitor Heart Rate The heart rate monitor watch implements 24h heart rate monitoring. Provide you with relatively accurate data and promptly remind you when your heart rate is too high. Monitor Blood Pressure The blood pressure watch has a blood pressure measurement function that other watches do not have, and is faster and more convenient than traditional measurement methods. Measuring Temperature Intelligent thermometer, self aware of temperature and cold. Set the design interval for automatic temperature measurement. Boold Oxygen Monitor Detect blood oxygen saturation through a blood oxygen optical sensor. When you need it,You can always see your own blood oxygen level. Menstrual period/Pregnancy New functions specially designed for women to protect women's health more comprehensively and meticulously. Sleep Tracking Wear the watch to sleep, the sleep tracker will automatically monitor sleep status and provide comprehensive sleep quality analysis (deep sleep, light sleep and wake up). Calendar/Calculator Very complete smart watch basic functions, such as: contacts, calendar, computer, weather, camera, control music, sedentary reminder, drink water reminder, timer, alarm clock,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife absolutely loves this watch
reviews.reviewText: This watch is extremely useful for various different things. It does all the other things that smart watches do like heart rate and steps but also it does blood pressure and is an oxygen sensor. And they absolute best part about it is it tracks my wife's menstrual cycle. It lets her know the day before she's supposed to start along with her ovulation schedule and all of that other good stuff. Lightweight but comfortable to wear. Extremely well made. It comes with two bands, one metal and one silicone. Easy to put on and switch out the bands. Beautiful watch faces included plus you can download more if wanted. The bezel on the face is absolutely beautiful with the stones in place. The stainless steel band has Stones embedded in it as well. Overall my wife is in love with this watch and I am very happy with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This watch is pretty great for the price. It tracks my menstrual cycle, heart beat, blood pressure, oxygen, workouts, and many more things. I can make call and answer calls very easily. There is tons of faces to pick from so it doesn't matter if it's a holiday or you have an obsession with an animal there is a perfect picture for everyday. The only thing bad I can say is the battery doesn't last long if answer calls. For the price you can't go wrong!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This watch is very nice. It comes with two bands, a charger, and a tool for removing the pins so you can adjust your metal watch band. I think that this is a well priced watch considering all of the features that are on it. It is cute and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such a beautiful elegant looking smart watch. I love that it is so beautiful and can be worn as a dressy look but is actually a smart watch and you can't tell. It is durable and well made. It was to easy to pair and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lot of features
reviews.reviewText: I'm blown away by the features this watch has for the price point! Receives calls and texts has loads of health related apps, calculator. Pairing was easy and boom it had the correct date and time and synced right up with phone. Battery life is good and the included charger magnetically snaps right on. I would've been happy with just receiving text and calls but does so much more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice smart watch more feminine than some others
reviews.reviewText: This is my second smart watch. It measures sleep, exercise, locates your phone, links your camera on your phone, you can read your texts and messages. The vinyl band is fairly comfortable but it also comes with leather straps you can switch to. Both. Bands are pink. It has many more functions all of which I haven’t figured out yet.
